title: Get emote from loot but still don't have it in collection
body: I bought hex box and spent rp. I get an emote but i can't find it in emote collection

replies.body: same happened to me just yesterday
there is nothing in my "emote" section in my loot. I think it is unlocked directly...

Yea, when you unlock an Emote through Hextech Crafting it is automatically added to your collection on the Collection > Emotes tab. You got the [Rawr!](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/File:Rawr!_Emote.png) emote which I can see in your current collection.
Go to loot and unlock it then need orange essence
